_meta.description: Definition complete de toutes les stats du jeu avec types de bonus et formules MMO-style
_meta.description_en: Complete definition of all game stats with bonus types and MMO-style formulas

bonus_types.flat: Ajoute directement a la stat (ex: +50 HP)

hp.name: Points de Vie
hp.description: Sante du personnage. A 0, le personnage meurt.
hp.description_en: Character's health. At 0, the character dies.

hp_regen.name: Regeneration HP
hp_regen.description: Points de vie regeneres par seconde hors combat.
hp_regen.description_en: Health points regenerated per second out of combat.

mp_regen.name: Regeneration MP
mp_regen.description: Points de mana regeneres par seconde hors combat.
mp_regen.description_en: Mana points regenerated per second out of combat.

hp_regen_combat.name: Regen HP Combat
hp_regen_combat.description: Points de vie regeneres par seconde EN combat.
hp_regen_combat.description_en: Health points regenerated per second IN combat.

mp_regen_combat.name: Regen MP Combat
mp_regen_combat.description: Points de mana regeneres par seconde EN combat.
mp_regen_combat.description_en: Mana points regenerated per second IN combat.

atk.name: Attaque
atk.description: Puissance des attaques physiques et competences physiques.
atk.description_en: Power of physical attacks and physical skills.

power.name: Puissance
power.description: ATK + MAG combines. Pour classes hybrides ou scaling universel.
power.description_en: ATK + MAG combined. For hybrid classes or universal scaling.

crit.name: Chance Critique
crit.description: Chance de coup critique (en %). Bonus toujours en points.
crit.description_en: Critical hit chance (in %). Bonus always in flat points.

crit_dmg.name: Degats Critiques
crit_dmg.description: Multiplicateur des degats critiques (en %). Bonus en points.
crit_dmg.description_en: Critical damage multiplier (in %). Bonus in flat points.

damage_percent.name: Bonus Degats %
damage_percent.description: Bonus multiplicatif aux degats infliges (tous types).
damage_percent.description_en: Multiplicative bonus to damage dealt (all types).

double_hit_chance.name: Chance Double Frappe
double_hit_chance.description: Chance de frapper deux fois (auto-attack uniquement).
double_hit_chance.formula: Si proc: attaque 2x, chaque hit = 100% damage

attack_speed.name: Vitesse d'Attaque
attack_speed.description: Multiplicateur de vitesse d'auto-attaque. Pas de cap.

armor_pen.name: Penetration Armure
armor_pen.description: % de l'armure enemie ignoree. Cap pour eviter immortalite des tanks.
armor_pen.description_en: % of enemy armor ignored. Capped to prevent tank immortality.

magic_pen.name: Penetration Magique
magic_pen.description: % de la resist magique enemie ignoree. Cap pour eviter immortalite.
magic_pen.description_en: % of enemy magic resist ignored. Capped to prevent immortality.

effect_chance.name: Chance d'Effet
effect_chance.description: Augmente la chance d'appliquer les debuffs et CC. Oppose a effect_resist.
effect_chance.description_en: Increases chance to apply debuffs and CC. Opposes effect_resist.

debuff_duration.name: Duree Debuffs
debuff_duration.description: Augmente la duree des debuffs et CC infliges aux ennemis.
debuff_duration.description_en: Increases duration of debuffs and CC applied to enemies.

shield_pierce.name: Perce-Bouclier
shield_pierce.description: % des degats qui ignorent le shield adverse.
shield_pierce.description_en: % of damage that ignores enemy shield.

shield_break.name: Brise-Bouclier
shield_break.description: % de degats bonus infliges aux shields.

flat_dr.name: Reduction Degats Fixe
flat_dr.description: Stat de base de reduction de degats fixe. Chaque point retire 1 point de degats recus (min 10% du coup). Stat allocable par le joueur.
flat_dr.description_en: Base flat damage reduction stat. Each point removes 1 damage from hits (min 10% of hit). Player-allocatable stat.
flat_dr.formula: total_flat_dr = flat_dr + damage_reduction_flat (from buffs). damage_after = max(damage × 0.1, damage - total_flat_dr)

armor.name: Armure
armor.description: Reduction POURCENTAGE des degats PHYSIQUES (ATK-based). Scaling logarithmique: 100 armor = 50% reduc, 200 = 66%, 300 = 75%. Peut etre bypass par armor_pen.
armor.description_en: PERCENTAGE reduction of PHYSICAL damage (ATK-based). Logarithmic scaling: 100 armor = 50% reduction, 200 = 66%, 300 = 75%. Can be bypassed by armor_pen.

magic_resist.name: Resistance Magique
magic_resist.description: Reduction POURCENTAGE des degats MAGIQUES (MAG-based). Meme scaling que armor: 100 mr = 50% reduc. Peut etre bypass par magic_pen.
magic_resist.description_en: PERCENTAGE reduction of MAGICAL damage (MAG-based). Same scaling as armor: 100 mr = 50% reduction. Can be bypassed by magic_pen.

damage_reduction.name: Reduction Degats %
damage_reduction.description: % reduction de TOUS les degats recus (apres armor/mr). BUFF UNIQUEMENT - pas une stat de base ni d'equipement.
damage_reduction.description_en: % reduction of ALL damage taken (after armor/mr). BUFF ONLY - not a base stat or equipment stat.

damage_reduction_flat.name: Reduction Degats Fixe
damage_reduction_flat.description: Reduction FIXE des degats recus (apres armor/mr). Retire X points de degats (min 10% du coup). Obtenu via skills, passifs ou equipement - pas une stat de base.
damage_reduction_flat.description_en: FLAT reduction of damage taken (after armor/mr). Removes X damage points (min 10% of hit). From skills, passives or equipment - not a base stat.

block_chance.name: Chance Bloquer
block_chance.description: Chance de bloquer une attaque (reduit degats de 50%).
block_chance.description_en: Chance to block an attack (reduces damage by 50%).

parry_chance.name: Chance Parer
parry_chance.description: Chance de parer (annule 100% degats, peut declencher riposte).
parry_chance.description_en: Chance to parry (negates 100% damage, can trigger counter-attack).
parry_chance.formula: Si parry: damage = 0, peut trigger counter-attack

effect_resist.name: Resistance aux Effets
effect_resist.description: Chance de resister aux debuffs et CC. Oppose a effect_chance.
effect_resist.description_en: Chance to resist debuffs and CC. Opposes effect_chance.

tenacity.name: Tenacite
tenacity.description: Reduit la duree des debuffs et CC subis.
tenacity.description_en: Reduces duration of debuffs and CC received.

hit.name: Precision
hit.description: Chance de toucher la cible. Oppose a Flee.
hit.description_en: Chance to hit the target. Opposes Flee.

flee.name: Esquive
flee.description: Chance d'esquiver les attaques. Oppose a Hit.
flee.description_en: Chance to dodge attacks. Opposes Hit.

buff_duration.name: Duree Buffs
buff_duration.description: Augmente la duree des buffs donnes (a soi ou aux allies).
buff_duration.description_en: Increases duration of buffs given (to self or allies).

lifesteal.name: Vol de Vie
lifesteal.description: % des degats physiques convertis en HP.
lifesteal.description_en: % of physical damage converted to HP.

spell_vamp.name: Vampirisme Magique
spell_vamp.description: % des degats magiques convertis en HP. Reduit sur AoE.
spell_vamp.description_en: % of magic damage converted to HP. Reduced on AoE.

thorns.name: Epines
thorns.description: Degats flat renvoyes aux attaquants melee.
thorns.description_en: Flat damage returned to melee attackers.
thorns.formula: On melee hit received: attacker takes thorns damage

reflect.name: Reflet
reflect.description: % des degats recus renvoyes a l'attaquant.
reflect.description_en: % of damage received returned to attacker.

shield.name: Bouclier
shield.description: Points de bouclier temporaire absorbant tous types de degats.
shield.description_en: Temporary shield points absorbing all damage types.
shield.formula: Absorbe les degats avant HP jusqu'a epuisement

luck.name: Chance
luck.description: Bonus aux drops et petits bonus RNG.
luck.description_en: Bonus to drops and minor RNG bonuses.

cast_speed.name: Vitesse Incantation
cast_speed.description: % reduction du temps d'incantation des sorts.

cooldown_reduction.name: Reduction Cooldown
cooldown_reduction.description: % reduction des temps de recharge des skills.

effect_system.description: Systeme de debuffs/CC style MMO - tous les sorts ont 100% de base
effect_system.description_en: MMO-style debuff/CC system - all spells have 100% base chance

apply_formula.explanation: Les sorts ont 100% de chance de base. La difference effect_resist - effect_chance determine la resistance. Minimum 15% pour toujours avoir une chance, maximum 85% pour pouvoir toujours resister.
apply_formula.explanation_en: Spells have 100% base chance. The difference effect_resist - effect_chance determines resistance. Minimum 15% to always have a chance, maximum 85% to always be able to resist.

duration_formula.base: Les debuffs/CC ont une duree de base en secondes
duration_formula.base_en: Debuffs/CC have a base duration in seconds

buff_formula.base: Les buffs ont une duree de base en secondes
buff_formula.base_en: Buffs have a base duration in seconds

steps: 7. Apply damage_reduction_flat (min 10% du coup) - via skills/passifs/equip
